snippet: Stocks were mixed on Friday, after a bad first day of the year, while crude oil futures pushed lower.
abstract: Stocks are mixed after first bad day of 2014, while crude oil futures push lower.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were mixed on Friday, after a bad first day of the year, while crude oil futures pushed lower.

headline.main: S.&P. Starts the Year on a Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Starts the Year on a Losing Streak
